start.state: Remember, Pearl: You are a being of elegance, grace, and intellect. You will win this game.

case.state: That’s okay, ~name~.
Don’t feel bad. somebody had to lose.
Not to brag on myself, but I’d like to congratulate myself for not losing this hand.
This game is essentially over!
Steven enjoys being shirtless a lot. Is that common in human men?
Mayor Dewey once offered me photographs of him doing that. I passed once, and I’ll pass again.
I don’t understand why she’s so excited about this.
I don’t understand why the other girls are so excited about this.
I don’t understand why the other girls are so excited about this.
Another success in the bag!
So accessories are for aesthetic enhancement, and these lighter outer layers are for?
It must be nice to be able to easily shed any bulky impediments to movement!
That is much less interesting than I was lead to believe!
I’d rather not be looking at that right now!
How does it… operate?
Victory shall be mine!
I never realized there were appearance modifiers that were so elegant and frilly….
Pearl, contain yourself.
I’ve raided a few tombs in my time, and it seems like you’d be a great addition to the team.
Amethyst and I have raided a few tombs in our time, and it seems like you’d be a great addition to the team.
That goes for you too, Chell.
That goes for you too, Ms.Comstock.
There’s no way a swollen gland of that size could be healthy for the maintenance of a typical human being such as yourself.
Look at the size of it! I had no idea these things were so big!
It’s so disproportionately large! Put it away!
How on Earth did you hide that whole thing?!
Yes, you're done for!
We're getting closer to a victory!
You changed colors! Who am I kidding: I see Steven without clothes all the time!
Hm... though it seems I've hardly made a dent in your defenses....
However, your clothing count is still moderately high. I supposed I’d like to get that down as low as possible.
Well, that's one opponent gone.
I’m not quite understanding the appeal of watching men masturbate.
Why does the masturbation come after the game of poker? What’s the connection? Do humans only ever masturbate after poker?
♪You’ll do it for him♪
♪You’ll do it for him♪
♪You’ll do it for him♪
Your technique is remarkably compelling....
The trend seems to be that viewing this ritual is pleasing to the id.
That’s okay, ~player~.
Don’t feel bad. somebody had to lose.
Well, it appears the host has lost!
I do like pie.
”With forest branches and the trodden weed, thou, silent form, dost tease us out of thought, as doth eternity: ‘Beauty is truth, truth beauty,—that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.’"
Who knew the human form could reveal such secrets?!
My word, that Hana is quite skilled at piloting her mech: She’s almost singlehandedly taken out Amethyst!
I spy another beautiful pearl.
I suppose I should take notes.
It appears that this ritual is a personal one with a high degree of variation...
What a visceral opening!
Oh, Amethyst, that’s so crass of you!
It seems that you're about to lose ~name~!
The last time this happened Beach City was tormented by gem monsters. Please do not do that.
I don’t understand the human concept of “pants.” There are many more aesthetically pleasing choices out there.
Hm... though it seems I've hardly made a dent in your defenses....
However, this change in attire does promote a more relaxed and casual environment.
Pageantry aside, is poker not our main focus here?
Amethyst! You’re so offensive!
I’ll have you know how hard it was to get that off last time. We got it by complete fluke. Who knew cards were the answer?
What is it with human men wearing the same style of underwear?
You know, when I agreed to learn strip poker, I did it under the assumption that I wouldn’t see so much floppy human skin….
Victory shall be mine!
Oh, is that... what "that" is?
If that’s how you do it, then how do the girls do it?
♪And you would do it again!♪
♪And you would do it again!♪
♪And you would do it again!♪
Aha! You're down to your last line of defense!
Let me guess: Now you’re going to get in the Frybo costume?
I’ve seen Greg and Amethyst in this scenario too many times to be pleased right now.
Aha! You're down to your last line of defense!
How on Earth did you keep those hidden away?!
”Between the breasts of bestial ~name~ lie large.”
Don’t feel bad. somebody had to lose.
That's okay, ~name~.
Well, that's one opponent gone.
Alright, everything begins with your stance.
It’d probably behoove me to learn a human ritual from someone already familiar with it.
♪You’ll do it for her♪
♪You’ll do it for her♪
♪You’ll do it for her♪
A gem fusing with a human being?! It’s impossible, or at the very least inappropriate.
A gem fusing with a human being?! It’s impossible, or at the very least inappropriate.
Yoga? I have a deep appreciation for the discipline.
Well, it appears the host has lost!
That’s okay, ~player~.
Don’t feel bad. somebody had to lose.
Would you say you’re a typical example of your sex?
It’s so disproportionately small! Put it away!
That’s what the other girls are getting excited about? I can hardly see it!
That’s what the other girls are getting excited about? I can hardly see it!
Hm... it seems to be human tradition to remove these in the early game....
WHAT WAS THAT?!?
WHAT WAS THAT?!?
HUMANS SHOULD NOT BE PRODUCING DISCHARGE AS SUCH!
HUMANS SHOULD NOT BE PRODUCING DISCHARGE AS SUCH!
Humans are so disgusting sometimes.
Aha! You're down to your last line of defense!
Symmetric and not in excess, your mammary aesthetics are just wonderful!
So small like rose petals, “Her breast is fit for pearls.”
Aha! You're down to your last line of defense!
Guess who’s earned some Pearl Points!
”I says the mmmoon… begins to… drool… softly… in the hot alley...”
Hm... it seems to be human tradition to remove these in the early game....
My opponent removing her outermost layer? It seems almost inconsequential!
At least I have the excuse of this all being part of my physical form. What you’re doing feels like cheating.
Elfstone, eh? What kind of magical properties does it have?
I see you’re trying to preserve your pristine unearthly projection. I can sympathize with that.
I can appreciate the value of a nice gem, Rosalina.
I can appreciate the value of a clean gem, Rosalina.
Genie jewels, eh? I wonder how those compare to lesbian space rocks?
It’s over, isn’t it?
It seems that you're about to lose, ~name~!
You cut a more impressive figure than I’d imagined, ~name~. I need to snap myself out of it.
Why does there appear to be so much reluctance surrounding this part of the ritual?
Please be careful, Tracer! My light-composed form can’t keep up with you moving faster than the speed of light.
Another success in the bag!
So that’s how I get you to lose….
How do you humans deal with such baggy clothing?
Oh, so that's when you stop?
Look at you go! It’s everywhere!
Humans sure do hold some interesting secrets…
It seems her fingers were too fast for us.
It seems her fingers were too fast for us.
This game is essentially over!
Oh? Must you take that off? It was so symmetrical!

You seem a bit... distracted... ~name~.

We're getting closer to a victory!

I’m not the only one playing the game. This isn’t exactly my thing, so I’m going to stand here and hope nothing goes awry.
I’ve heard human men get super distracted when their exposed like this. Surely this’ll play into my favor!
I do believe these cards will do the trick!
Oh, how very nice.
